text: 750.00 | (?) | 73; To Dane H. Ferrier | of the Century C.; Walt Whitman3[2]8 Mickle streetCamden New JerseyJuly 25 '86Dear Sir,I have finished the article Army Hospitals and CasesMemoranda at the time—1863-'6By Walt Whitman & will send it on in a couple of days—It will make perhaps six pages—Walt Whitman Walt Whitman to the Editor of the Century Illustrated Monthly Review, 25 July 1886
